main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 20 September 1962 in Kansas City, Kansas, where the object resembled a large star or planet and made a rapid transition across the sky before hovering and pulsating for several minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes before disappearing to the northwest., Several ground radar observations corroborated the visual sightings., The object was estimated to be approximately 3,000 feet over Kansas City., Multiple witnesses included postal clerks in Kansas City., The report concluded possibilities ranging from a balloon to a hoax.
sighted object: a large star or planet-like object
